name: Running Up (CradleDev)
description:
Welcome to Running Up, the action-packed platformer game that will keep you on the edge of your seat! In this endless runner game, you will jump from one platform to another while fighting off enemies and collecting points.

As a 2D colorful game, Running Up offers exciting gameplay and smooth controls. The objective of the game is to move up the platforms without falling, all while avoiding collisions with the enemy. The higher you go, the more points you'll earn, so be quick on your feet!

In addition to jumping from platform to platform, you'll also have the opportunity to collect items on your way up. These items will earn you even more points, so make sure to keep an eye out for them.

With endless runner gameplay, Running Up offers hours of entertainment. And best of all, it's free to download and play on your mobile device. So why wait? Download Running Up today and start jumping, fighting, and collecting points!
